This is the Jaxen navigator for JDOM 1.x.
The current version is 2.0.0. This release requires Java 1.5 or later. If you're still using Java 1.4, try Jaxen 1.2.0. If you're still using Java 1.3 or earlier, try Jaxen 1.1.6.
Jaxen's Maven group ID is jaxen and its artifact ID is jaxen. To use Jaxen with JDOM and Maven Maven, add this dependency element to your pom.xml:
<dependency> <groupId>jaxen</groupId> <artifactId>jaxen-core</artifactId> <version>2.0.0</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>jaxen</groupId> <artifactId>jdom-navigator</artifactId> <version>2.0.0</version> </dependency>
To add a dependency using Gradle:
dependencies { compile 'jaxen:jaxen-core:2.0.0' compile 'jaxen:jdom-navigator:2.0.0' }
